name: Bent Over Single Arm Row (Dumbbell)
summary: Place one knee and one hand on a bench for support, holding a dumbbell in your other hand.
Keep your back flat and your core engaged.
Let the dumbbell hang straight down from your shoulder.
Pull the dumbbell up toward your waist by bending your elbow.
Squeeze your back at the top, then lower the dumbbell slowly.
Complete your reps, then switch sides.

name: Bent Over Row (Barbell)
summary: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and grip the barbell with both hands.
Hinge at the hips and bend your knees slightly, keeping your back flat.
Let the bar hang at arm’s length below your chest.
Pull the barbell toward your lower ribcage by bending your elbows.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the top.
Lower the bar back down with control and repeat.

name: Bent Over Row (Dumbbell)
summary: Stand with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Hinge at the hips and bend your knees slightly, keeping your back flat.
Let the dumbbells hang at arm’s length below your chest.
Pull the dumbbells toward your waist by bending your elbows.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the top.
Lower the weights back down with control and repeat.

name: Chin-Up
summary: Grab the pull-up bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Hang with your arms fully extended and legs crossed behind you.
Pull your chest up toward the bar by bending your elbows.
Squeeze your back and biceps at the top.
Lower yourself back down with control until your arms are fully extended.
Repeat for your desired number of reps.

name: Chin-Up (Assisted)
summary: Set up an assisted pull-up machine or loop a resistance band around the bar.
Grab the bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step onto the platform or place your knees in the band.
Pull your chest up toward the bar by bending your elbows.
Squeeze your back and biceps at the top of the movement.
Lower yourself down slowly until your arms are fully extended, then repeat.

name: Chin-Up (Weighted)
summary: Attach a weight belt or wear a weighted vest for added resistance.
Grab the pull-up bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Hang with your arms fully extended and core engaged.
Pull your chest up toward the bar by bending your elbows.
Squeeze your back and biceps at the top of the movement.
Lower yourself back down with control and repeat.

name: Incline Row (Dumbbell)
summary: Set an incline bench to about 45 degrees and lie face down with a dumbbell in each hand.
Let your arms hang straight down with palms facing each other.
Pull the dumbbells up toward your sides by bending your elbows.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the top of the movement.
Lower the dumbbells back to the starting position with control.
Repeat while keeping your chest on the bench and core engaged.

name: Inverted Row
summary: Lie underneath a bar set at waist height and grab it with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Extend your legs and keep your body in a straight line.
Pull your chest toward the bar by bending your elbows and squeezing your shoulder blades.
Pause briefly at the top of the movement.
Lower yourself back down with control until your arms are fully extended.
Repeat while keeping your core tight and body aligned.

name: Iso-Lateral Row (Machine)
summary: Sit on the machine and place your chest firmly against the pad.
Grab the handles with a neutral grip, arms extended.
Pull one or both handles toward your sides by bending your elbows.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the peak of the movement.
Slowly return the handles to the starting position with control.
Repeat for your desired number of reps, alternating arms if desired.

name: Lat Pulldown (Cable)
summary: Sit at the lat pulldown machine and adjust the thigh pad to keep your legs secure.
Grab the bar with a wide overhand grip.
Pull the bar down toward your upper chest while keeping your torso upright.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the bottom of the movement.
Slowly return the bar to the starting position with control.
Repeat while avoiding any swinging or leaning back.

name: Lat Pulldown (Machine)
summary: Sit at the lat pulldown machine and adjust the thigh pad to lock your legs in place.
Grab the handles with a wide grip, palms facing forward.
Pull the handles down toward your upper chest while keeping your back straight.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the bottom of the movement.
Slowly let the handles return to the starting position with control.
Repeat while maintaining proper form throughout the set.

name: Lat Pulldown Single Arm (Cable)
summary: Sit at a cable lat pulldown station with a single handle attached to the pulley.
Grab the handle with one hand and sit upright with your core engaged.
Pull the handle down toward your shoulder by bending your elbow.
Squeeze your back at the bottom of the movement.
Slowly return the handle to the starting position with control.
Complete your reps, then switch arms and repeat.

name: Lat Pulldown Wide Grip (Cable)
summary: Sit at the cable lat pulldown machine and secure your legs under the thigh pad.
Grab the wide bar with an overhand grip, hands placed wider than shoulder width.
Pull the bar down toward your upper chest while keeping your torso upright.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the bottom of the movement.
Slowly return the bar to the top with control.
Repeat for your desired number of reps while keeping proper form.

name: Pendlay Row (Barbell)
summary: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and grip the barbell with an overhand grip.
Bend at the hips until your torso is nearly parallel to the floor, keeping your back flat.
Let the bar rest on the floor between each rep.
Pull the bar explosively toward your lower chest by driving your elbows back.
Lower the bar back to the floor under control.
Reset your position and repeat each rep from a dead stop.

name: Pull-Up
summary: Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder width.
Hang with your arms fully extended and core engaged.
Pull your chin above the bar by bending your elbows and squeezing your back.
Pause briefly at the top of the movement.
Lower yourself back down with control until your arms are fully extended.
Repeat for your desired number of reps.

name: Pull-Up (Assisted)
summary: Set up an assisted pull-up machine or use a resistance band for support.
Grab the bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder width.
Step onto the machine platform or place your knees in the band.
Pull your chin above the bar by bending your elbows and squeezing your back.
Pause at the top, then lower yourself back down with control.
Repeat while maintaining proper form throughout.

name: Pull-Up (Weighted)
summary: Attach a weight belt or wear a weighted vest for added resistance.
Grab the bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder width.
Hang with arms fully extended and core braced.
Pull your chin above the bar by driving your elbows down and back.
Pause at the top, then lower yourself under control.
Repeat while keeping proper posture and control.

name: Seated Row (Cable)
summary: Sit at a cable row machine with your feet placed firmly on the platform.
Grab the handle with both hands and sit upright with your back straight.
Pull the handle toward your torso by bending your elbows and squeezing your shoulder blades.
Keep your elbows close to your body throughout the movement.
Slowly extend your arms to return to the starting position.
Repeat with control for your desired number of reps.

name: Seated Row (Machine)
summary: Sit on the machine with your chest against the pad and feet flat on the floor.
Grab the handles with a neutral grip and keep your arms extended.
Pull the handles toward your body by driving your elbows straight back.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the peak of the movement.
Slowly return the handles to the starting position with control.
Repeat while keeping your torso still and core engaged.

name: Seated Row Wide Grip (Cable)
summary: Sit at a cable row station and attach a wide grip bar to the pulley.
Place your feet on the platform and sit upright with your back straight.
Grab the bar with a wide overhand grip and extend your arms.
Pull the bar toward your upper abdomen by driving your elbows back and flaring them slightly outward.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the peak.
Slowly return to the starting position and repeat with control.

name: Shrug (Dumbbell)
summary: Stand upright with a dumbbell in each hand at your sides, palms facing your body.
Keep your arms straight and your core tight.
Lift your shoulders straight up toward your ears as high as possible.
Pause and squeeze your traps at the top of the movement.
Lower your shoulders back down slowly and under control.
Repeat for your desired number of reps.

name: T-Bar Row (Machine)
summary: Position yourself on the T-bar row machine with your chest against the pad and feet secured.
Grab the handles with a neutral grip and extend your arms fully.
Pull the handles toward your torso by driving your elbows back.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the top of the movement.
Slowly return the handles to the starting position with control.
Repeat while keeping your chest on the pad and core tight.
